title: display name is not displayed after browser restart
body:
### expected behaviour
display name should be persistent across sessions, even after login

### actual behaviour
display name is deleted after login

### steps to reproduce
1. login, set a display name for the user
2. logout
3. login again

### server configuration
operating system: debian gnu/linux 7

web server: nginx/1.4.4

database: mysql 5.5.31

php version: php 5.5.6

owncloud version: 6.0.0rc3

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: updated

list of activated app: only default

the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)

```
<?php
$config = array (
  'instanceid' => '...',
  'passwordsalt' => '...',
  'datadirectory' => '/srv/www/...../data',
  'dbtype' => 'mysql',
  'version' => '6.0.0.11',
  'dbname' => '...',
  'dbhost' => 'localhost',
  'dbtableprefix' => 'oc_',
  'dbuser' => '...',
  'dbpassword' => '...',
  'installed' => true,
  'forcessl' => true,
  'maintenance' => false,
  'theme' => '',
);
```

### client configuration
browser: chrome, firefox

operating system: windows, mac, any version

### logs
#### web server error log
```
insert your webserver log here
```

```

```
